PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-10612017-08-14VAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActVeterans Well-being Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Forces Members and Veterans Re-establishment and Compensation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN FORCES MEMBERS AND VETERANS RE-ESTABLISHMENT AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) support the creation and delivery of the Education and Training Benefit and the Caregiver Recognition Benefit; (2) support the re-design and delivery of Career Transition Services; (3) extend the application waiver to all benefits and services provided under the Act, and support the application waiver process; (4) change the name of the Canadian Forces Members and Veterans Re-establishment and Compensation Regulations to the Veterans Well-being Regulations, to be consistent with the new name of the Act; and (5) demonstrate the Government of Canadaâ€™s continued commitment and leadership to help support the well-being of Veterans and their families.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0161 Publication Date: 2017-09-06
AttachmentsAttachment
